snippet: Britain spied on Argentine military and political leaders to ensure the security of the Falkland Islands from 2006 to 2011, an Argentine television channel reported on Friday, citing intelligence documents provided by Edward J. Snowden.
lead_paragraph: Britain spied on Argentine military and political leaders to ensure the security of the Falkland Islands from 2006 to 2011, an Argentine television channel reported on Friday, citing intelligence documents provided by Edward J. Snowden.

headline.main: Argentina: Britain Spied to Ensure Falklands Security, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Argentina: Britain Spied to Ensure Falklands Security, Report Says
